Author: oodlesNnoodle
Text: Iron is the most likely suspect but vitamin k deficiency can also cause bruising but in general it causes excessive bleeding.

Author: j4jackj
Text: Malnutrition in general can cause scurvy-like symptoms without having low ascorbate.  First thought is B-complex vitamin deficiencies, as well as protein deficiencies.  Seek medical help. Say you've been starving for a while and you've developed this thing with bruising. You should tell them that you want to check what's up - maybe you think you're thrombocytopenic from starving yourself, and want to know what deficiencies are so urgent they can't wait for recovery.
